nodes.text: Malicar 3 was a planet in the Outer Rim Territories, covered in rocky wastes.
In 11 ABY, Admiral Mir Tork and Dr. Leonis Murthé fled to Malicar 3 from the New Republic onboard the Imperial extermination ship Azgoghk.

Slique Brighteyes, one of the last member of a species targeted by the ship, the Gulmarids, hired bounty hunter Boba Fett to execute Murthé and Tork. Fett engaged with the Azgoghk on Malicar 3, disabling it and killing its two insane overseers. The ship remained dormant on Malicar 3 and the planet then served as home for the nonhumans freed from the Empire.
